name: The Big Guy
description:
This game was made for the Trijam #192, whose theme was "Out of the Way".

It took me 2 hours, 58 minutes and 8.53 seconds to complete.

Welcome to The Big Guy - you play as a big guy who is so big, he can't stop! Collect piggy banks and invest the money, with the end goal of making a million Dollarbucks. However, be careful - hitting pedestrians will force you to pay indemnities(which grow exponentially each time you crush a pedestrian!). 

Controls are explained inside the game.

I hope you enjoy!
